content.text:
# Draft:Endorsements in the 1968 Democratic presidential primaries

This is a list of endorsements for declared candidates in the Democratic primaries for the 1968 United States presidential election.
Aggregate Endorsement Maps
House of Representatives
File:1968DemocraticHousePresidentialEndorsements April1.svg|As of April 1st, 1968.
File:1968DemocraticHousePresidentialEndorsements May1.svg|As of May 1st, 1968.
File:1968DemocraticHousePresidentialEndorsements June1.svg|As of June 1st, 1968.
File:1968DemocraticHousePresidentialEndorsements July1.svg|As of July 1st, 1968.
File:1968DemocraticHousePresidentialEndorsements August1.svg|As of August 1st, 1968.
File:1968DemocraticHousePresidentialEndorsements August29.svg|As of August 29th, 1968.
